{"id":1116125183,"question_id":3234,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1702176172,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1116125183/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Double Modular Exponentiation","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<Integer> getGoodIndices(int[][] variables, int target) {\n        List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        int len = variables.length;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            int[] var = variables[i];\n            int a = var[0];\n            int b = var[1];\n            int c = var[2];\n            int m = var[3];\n            \n            //((ai^bi % 10)^ci) % mi == target\n            int ans = (int)Math.pow(a, b)%10;\n            ans = (int)Math.pow(ans, c)%m;\n            \n            if(ans==target) res.add(i);\n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"double-modular-exponentiation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
